entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build_Components_WithDesktopMSBuild_Works appears to be failing flakily #39960
  • Machine-readable `dotnet test --list-tests` output #39957
  • Resolve `dotnet-watch` dependency to avoid CVE-2023-29331 scanner false positive #39955
  • Hope to support installation via Flatpak #39941
  • A source code nuget package defining a .cs.pp file fails to resolve the namespace if <RootNamespace> is not set in the project #39933
  • `Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers` version '8.0.202' warning is incorrect on `8.0.1xx` SDK #39931

Closed

  • `dotnet watch` support for launching program in a different working directory #29539
  • Add `-r` to `dotnet watch` #25612
  • dotnet watch doesn't respect configuration arg #36611
  • Value of DOTNET_WATCH inconsistent at build time #34055
  • Unable to use `[env:key=value]` directive with `dotnet watch` in 8.0.20x #39020
  • [Megathread] Infrastructure Issues #28442
  • Missing tag for v8.0.201 #39164
  • Getting the error CS0103 The name 'paramName' does not exist in the current context in terminal but not in IDE #39162
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24175.24] CS1061 error when building OrchardCore #39847
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk - error MSB3073 (tsc: not found) #39906

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #39971
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39970
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #39969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #39962
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39961
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #39959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #39958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • update warning message for containers package inclusion #39956
    untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Containers 8.0.3xx Package Release Notes #39942
    untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers

Merged

  • [release/8.0.2xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39781
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39841
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.105 #39952
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.409 #39951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.119 #39949
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rewrite dotnet watch command line parsing #39618
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39838
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39844
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.316 #39950
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.205 #39953
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.422 #39948

Updated

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39764
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39845
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Don't use the xunit return code when running in helix only #39271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ingest new props file from installer and use it to auto-include Toolset Compilers package #39701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Respect the profile attribute on runtime packs #39402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
